title: Thank god they didn't overwrite Payday 2 with Payday 3
description: Payday 2 still has more active players than its new sequel.

title: After 3 years of 'hands-off' management, Microsoft is making Bethesda and ZeniMax report directly to an Xbox bigwig
description: A reorganization of Xbox studios will put ZeniMax and its subsidiaries under the control of newly-minted president of game content and studios Matt Booty.
